channel.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
channel.description: The update server changed kind of alot since 317 /377, but is it possible to disable it, without loosing alot of features, if yes, exacly how? Graham intergrated an update server - yes I know. Still, is it auctally disable'able?

moparisthebest.com/smf you’ll get most help.

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I didn’t just make a server for the update keys, instead a full update server so I don’t have to download huge zip files like the current moparscape does it.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @peterbjornx peterbjornx
item.description:
@peterbjornx wrote:

yes and why make a server for it if you can easily trace the parser method and edit it so it will load from 255.jct or something, or even better write a actual update server such as the 1 in rs2p , which loads a filestore calculates the referencetable entry 255 and sends all files , not just a (censored) hardcoded response you moparscapers and runeservians call update keys.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

Moparisthebest:

All the 508 ‘update server’ requests is a byte array moparscape servers generally call ‘update keys’. I “disabled” this in the new moparscape by writing a simple server to send it these keys when requested that is ran concurrently with the client.

you’re doing it wrong, then; the ‘update keys’ consist of a full container file, encapsulating the reference table checksums.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest

All the 508 ‘update server’ requests is a byte array moparscape servers generally call ‘update keys’. I “disabled” this in the new moparscape by writing a simple server to send it these keys when requested that is ran concurrently with the client.

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Palidino_, post:42, topic:244626”][quote author=the bank link=topic=321001.msg2540038#msg2540038 date=1226957112]

http://moparisthebest.com with you.

Except moparscape is for private servers… This doesn’t necessarily deal with it…

For example, disable the update server, to load teh engine, and experiment with rendering models in the actual game engine… or stepping through the interface engine called “runescript”… There’s several practical applications, just because a child named “the bank” lacks imagination doesn’t mean he should tell everyone what to think and where.
[/quote]You are a moparscaper yourself, so it is not your spot to speak.

A certain idiot made a 508 private server, which other certain idiots ripped to claim as there own etc etc etc.

Why else would he want to edit an update server for a 508 client you fucking moron, not to mention I am not the first one to tell him to get the fuck off this site.

So please, get off his hairy balls.

Sir, I might not be as smart as you (assuming you are intelligent as I don’t know you), and the work that I release might be complete and utter shit, but I’m not an idiot <3.[/quote]
if it makes you feel any better he also called pplsuqbawlz a moparscaper

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:38, topic:244626”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=321001.msg2564067#msg2564067 date=1228315219]
on the topic of intelligence, you cannot really judge the intelligence of a person by reading their forum posts, i mean i can post like a twat on this forum for a laugh when i’m drunk, yet still be an intelligent person. however i do agree you get more intelligent people than others, and that becomes more obvious the more you speak to them / stalk their posts, but the main point is, that dont judge a person by a post.
[/quote]
I dont see how there should be a difference. If they act stupid on the forums they should be treated like they’re stupid.[/quote]

but they should still be given a chance,

also, another point which i didn’t put across is that you cannot label a whole genre of people from what one member did / has done. that’s like labeling all Muslims as terrorists or all Americans as rednecks! it just doesnt happen, though you will get some rampant dick who will argue otherwise.

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

the bank:

this is private server related

No it isn’t. This is client hacking related. It dosen’t matter why he wants to do it, it is client hacking related.

You people really need to stop jumping on people who ask client questions in the correct section just because they happen to be into private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:32, topic:244626”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=321001.msg2540699#msg2540699 date=1226976653]

You are a moparscaper yourself

Fuck off with the “moparscaper” bullshit. If you’re going to insult somebody, do it properly, rather than doing it in such a shit-like manner you have been doing this entire thread.
[/quote]now i urge you all to rethink the situation on some moparscapers, as not all are dimwits, and don’t argue about who is more intelligent, as thats just fucking retarded.[/quote]I agree completely.

TeleNubby, Tico135 and others are intelligent people whom have made a difference in the scene, and should not be frowned upon because of the forums they are active on.

When I, or anyone, calls someone a “moparscaper”, it is a generalization, not an insult. It is putting them in a group where the vast majority are idiots.

I suppose the easiest way I could explain it is to relate it to racism. When a black person does something bad, they get all mad, drop the N-Bomb etc etc etc, but that doesn’t mean that all black people are bad.

The problem with cartridges is that this is private server related, which you could see he is into by, as stated by vbcoderx, looking through his posts.

If he had not reacted in such a bad way to being asked to go to a private server related community, then this problem would never have arose.

Regardless, this thread will continue to fill with spam, so if a staff member could lock it that’d be great.

Read full topic

…
[/quote]…[/quote]Thank you.

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:33, topic:244626”]Most likely it’s just the attitude of ‘moparscapers’ which causes their bad reputation. They expect the answer to appear in front of them in a matter of seconds. They don’t know much about computers and related stuff, so they go crazy when someone updates their server.[/quote]You were like that once too. As was I, and everybody else here. Insulting them and putting them down does not help this situation a single bit, rather, it intimidates them and causes this ‘bad reputation.’

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:12, topic:244626”][quote author=the bank link=topic=321001.msg2540038#msg2540038 date=1226957112]
You are a moparscaper yourself
[/quote]
Fuck off with the “moparscaper” bullshit. If you’re going to insult somebody, do it properly, rather than doing it in such a shit-like manner you have been doing this entire thread.[/quote]

TeleNubby is right, i think its unfair to call people such as TeleNubby “moparscapers” in the context we all know it as today. now you may think i’m sucking up, well no, not really, as TeleNubby, Tico135 and other members have contributed far more then most of the standard average members here, and more to the point, the contributions which thay have made have been useful and of good quality.

on the topic of intelligence, you cannot really judge the intelligence of a person by reading their forum posts, i mean i can post like a twat on this forum for a laugh when i’m drunk, yet still be an intelligent person. however i do agree you get more intelligent people than others, and that becomes more obvious the more you speak to them / stalk their posts, but the main point is, that dont judge a person by a post.

now i urge you all to rethink the situation on some moparscapers, as not all are dimwits, and don’t argue about who is more intelligent, as thats just fucking retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

cartridges:

Interesting and stupid… No wonder this site is so slow… We have to bite the bullet for those faggots?

Interesting considering that this page was created in 0.039 seconds. See the bottom of the page.

It is obvious that the size of the database doesn’t matter so the only issue is other resource use such as bandwidth. Its unlikely that moparscape would get shutdown (for financial reasons or pure convenience) so i don’t see what benefit separating the database would have.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling the 508 update server?
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“cartridges, post:21, topic:244626”]…

Intelligent only via comparison… He’s still an idiot rummaging in the dark, no idea of the dangers.[/quote]

Intelligent is more then plain client knowledge ;). He does have the skills to write patterns, although he might not now what all the fields stand for.
Not to mention, everybody has to start somewhere. I did the same in the beginning on the ARGA fields, now I find fields myself.

It’s just a matter of time.

cartridges:

Interesting and stupid… No wonder this site is so slow… We have to bite the bullet for those faggots?

This site is fast for me, also it does not have anything to do with it since both db’s run on the same server. It just uses a few equal tables.
